About

Who?

My name is James McConnell. I founded Rabbit Ears Design in 2021 with the goal of creating a more personal web development experience for my clients. I am a problem solver who recognizes that each project is unique and no two websites are the same.

What?

Rabbit Ears Design is a front end web development and design studio primarily geared toward small businesses. I build high quality websites that support client goals. I offer Wordpress development services as well as sites built entirely from scratch for a more custom feel. Whatever your needs, there is an approach that can be tailored to meet them.

Why?

At Rabbit Ears Design, I am focused on providing unique attention to my clients. I meet will meet with you to discuss your goals and help tailor a solution specifically to meet them.

I utilize design fundamentals to bring each project to life. I recognize that you may not know what you want from a website or you may already have a working site. Regardless of where you are in the process, I will assist in taking your dream and putting it on the screen!
